title: Subpart 1644-2 - Debt Service Prior To Issuance Of Housing Bonds
content:
Subpart 1644-2 - Debt Service Prior To Issuance Of Housing Bonds

State Regulations
§ 1644-2.1 - Provision for payment of interest
§ 1644-2.2 - Computation of interest on temporary (short-term) indebtedness
§ 1644-2.3 - Recording the interest accrual
§ 1644-2.4 - Allocation of interest charges to related programs
§ 1644-2.5 - Premium on temporary loan notes
§ 1644-2.6 - Payment of interest

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
